nodes.title:
US Unemployment Rate moved down to 6.0% in March. Prior readings:
-6.2% in Feb
-6.3% in Jan
-6.7% in Nov/Dec
-6.9% in October
-7.9% in September
-8.4% in August
-10.2% in July
-11.1% in June
-13.3% in May
-14.7% in April

Was @ 3.5% last February (50-yr low) before the shutdowns. https://t.co/M78MMABwHD

sharedContent.title:
1. Stocks: all-time high
2. Home prices: all-time high
3. Crypto (Bitcoin/Ethereum): all-time highs
4. Inflation expectations: highest since 2008
5. Fed: we need 0% rates through at least the end of 2023 & trillions more in bond buying to boost asset prices & increase inflation.

1. Stocks: all-time high
2. Home prices: all-time high
3. Crypto (Bitcoin/Ethereum): all-time highs
4. Inflation expectations: highest since 2008
5. Fed: we need 0% rates through at least the end of 2023 & trillions more in bond buying to boost asset prices & increase inflation.
